headline: We are looking for passionate Next.js and React developers to give feedback on TinaCMS.
body:
You will be exploring guides and starters the team has created, and perhaps even building a website while you are at it!

We will be compensating each user with a $75 prepaid Mastercard.

meta.title: TinaCMS Developer Experience Study
meta.description: We are looking for passionate Next.js and React developers to give feedback on TinaCMS.
